sourcesContent:
About ROYAL BLOOMAA

Crafting Exceptional Floral Experiences Since 2010

At ROYAL BLOOMAA, we believe in the transformative power of flowers. Our passion for floral artistry and commitment to excellence has made us a trusted name in creating breathtaking floral arrangements for all occasions.

Our Core Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Passion

We pour our hearts into every arrangement, ensuring each creation tells a unique story.

Excellence

We strive for perfection in every detail, from flower selection to final presentation.

Sustainability

We're committed to eco-friendly practices and supporting local flower growers.

Meet Our Team

The talented individuals behind our beautiful creations

Sarah Johnson

Lead Floral Designer

With over 15 years of experience, Sarah brings creativity and expertise to every arrangement.

Michael Chen

Creative Director

Michael's innovative vision helps shape our unique floral designs and brand identity.

Emma Rodriguez

Event Specialist

Emma ensures every event is perfectly coordinated with stunning floral arrangements.

Our Journey

Key milestones that shaped our story

2010

The Beginning

ROYAL BLOOMAA opens its first boutique store in the heart of the city.

2015

Expansion

Launch of our wedding and events division, serving high-profile clients.

2018

Innovation

Introduction of our online ordering system and same-day delivery service.

2023

Recognition

Named "Best Florist" by the City Excellence Awards.

Get in Touch

Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

Contact Us
